ORMS Pricing September 18, 2018
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
Attached is our most current pricing sheet.
Does it seem like your clients are confused about the reverse mortgage line of credit? The line of credit may seem complicated, but it’s easy for clients to use. Here’s how we describe the HECM Line of Credit:
- “How does the reverse mortgage line of credit grow?” Unused funds in the line of credit will grow over time in accordance with your growth rate. This value is determined from several values including: 1) the current index value 2) the margin and 3) the annual mortgage insurance premium that is paid to the FHA. As an adjustable rate, your growth rate may vary over time. - “What if I change my mind and want a lump sum?” You can use the funds in your line of credit however you wish; if you choose, you could withdraw all of the money at once as a lump sum or elect to receive monthly disbursements. Otherwise, these funds will remain available for use in your line of credit as they grow. - “Can I get a fixed rate reverse mortgage line of credit?” At the moment, the reverse mortgage line of credit is only available as an adjustable rate loan.
You can now run clients who are 62+ through our scenario calculator to see what they could qualify for. If you do not have access to the portal yet, please attend a training session by clicking on a link below.
Please reach out if you have any questions. I am here to help!
